### Description
Besu node was down for sometime, it started syncing and after it's caught up with the head it lost a lot of peers.

Log at the time it lost peers and caught up with head of the chain
```
2023-02-23 11:46:44.938+11:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | INFO  | AbstractEngineForkchoiceUpdated | VALID for fork-choice-update: head: 0x6644a57fe8de75c7e84c3ab684d3a0639baf308673c065ab625163b55537538a,>
2023-02-23 11:46:49.882+11:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | INFO  | AbstractEngineNewPayload | Imported #16,687,627 / 212 tx / base fee 35.95 gwei / 15,878,411 (52.9%) gas / (0x50cc7d4a3ed7bbe3667448782ef1>
2023-02-23 11:47:01.670+11:00 | vert.x-worker-thread-0 | INFO  | AbstractEngineNewPayload | Imported #16,687,628 / 120 tx / base fee 36.21 gwei / 16,691,063 (55.6%) gas / (0xed59505294f653f228341cb45ca6>
2023-02-23 11:47:07.709+11:00 | Timer-0 | INFO  | DNSResolver | Resolved 2409 nodes
```
